I've worked with Rick on a variety of video projects and was always so impressed with the final output of his work. He is creative, with a keen eye for detail, resulting in top-quality work that stands out from the rest. And the fact that he's just a great guy to work with is icing on the top!

Rick is a multitalented producer, editor and videographer with a keen creative eye and an infectious enthusiasm for his work.  I supervised him early in his career and was more than impressed by his desire to constantly strive for improvement in all facets of his craft.  More recently I have had the privilege to provide his organization with contract services and was pleased to find that his even tempered, unflappable style was unchanged.  Even under the most adverse conditions, I found he would not only meet, but exceed expectations. Tight deadline?  No problem!  He will do what it takes.  Don't quite know what creative approach to take?  Rick will invariably come up with a unique perspective -- and do so in a low key, sanguine manner that makes him a pleasure to work with.  You might even think it was your idea!  I honestly believe his greatest kick in life is not just getting it right, but nailing it.  I can't recommend him highly enough!

Rick is a superb video talent. He makes any story jump off the screen through his stellar producing, script writing, videography and editing. He weaves together images, music and words that convey the exact message or emotions intended for all of the various audiences we targeted at TriWest. Rick also has a heart of gold. He has a can-do attitude and willing to go the extra mile to get the job done. He's always smiling, which can be infectious. Additionally, Rick is a wonderful, patient teacher who has taught me and many others in the company as we learned how to write scripts and other facets of video development. 5 Stars!

Rick Nichols is not just an award-winning shooter. He's a producer, director, editor, sound man, lighting man, grip, web and graphics designer. Whatever you put in front of him, he can do. He built an entire in-house  film and edit studio, including green screen, sound booth and satellite/web download/upload for live programming. He also built portable studios that were placed inside hospitals so that clients could run their own live and prerecorded training programs. If ever there was a video/film professional whom I would want by my side in some remote jungle location, it would be Rick. He'll make it work, no matter what challenges he faces. I would recommend him, and work with him again, anytime.

summary: Owner & Operations General Manager, Restaurateur Crazy Ed's Satisfied FrogTV, Live Events Producer & Marketing ExpertCurrently a owner and partner at Crazy Ed's Satisfied Frog Mexico, Rick has been essential in the building and rebranding success of this venture in it's first international debut.  Within the first three years Rick has helped The Satisfied Frog become one of Trip Advisor and Yelp Top Ten Restaurants in Peñasco and bring the operations into operating at a profit and delivering dividens to its' partners.Rick is a multi-Emmy award winning Producer, Director, Videographer, Editor, Writer and Video Production Manager with 30 years of experience in producing outstanding broadcast and corporate commercials, documentary, training and music videos. He excels in maximizing content delivery through process planning and multitasking resulting in increased communications output and reduction in equipment and personnel expenditure.Broadcast: Decades of professional experience in script to screen production of news and commercial work for broadcasting clients.Documentaries: “Walking Among The Sharks” with Bill Kurtis and “The New Explorers” and “Cave Of The Glowing Skulls” shot in the jungles of Honduras. Corporate Videos: Countless educational, training , corporate communications branded messaging videos for TriWest Healthcare Alliance, Entergy Services, the Department of Defense and a multitude of Fortune 500 companies. Music Videos:“Freedom Never Cries” - In collaboration with Grammy nominated John Ondrasik with Five For Fighting, Rick produced and directed the music videoLive Events: Show Producer and Director for Mitsubishi, Midway Entertainment, Cox Communications and the 2008, 2009 & 2010 Congressional Medal of Honor Foundation’s Celebration of Freedom at the Ronald Reagan Library in California.
